channel.title: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development
channel.description:
Hey Everyone,
My name is Wilddar, but you can call me Rob. I didn't know where to post this so I am posting it here. This topic is about me wanting to know fully, on how to create a RSPS.
Some examples I would like to know are:
Understanding the code that makes the server. Adding NPC's Adding Shops Making new Teleports Adding Minigames Adding New Skills Adding Objects Adding Welcome Messages Creating new Commands Creating New Sections only accessible to Donators/Moderators/etc Adding Quests
Stuff like that. I am willing to learn first off, and I will follow the directions that you give me the best I can. I pretty much asking a experienced coder of Rsps to teach me to pretty much be able to create a server, from a blank source, without errors. This may take a long time, but I would really like to learn, and I have the will to learn. I would only be available every other week, so you would get a break from teaching me one week then teach me the next. Like I said I just want to know the art and trade of creating a rsps.
Please respond, If you are willing to teach me, and if you are please add my msn: Blade1944@live.com
Thanks so much! :)

item.title: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

This section is not for RSPS development. I would advise that you read up on some java documents instead of letting another teach you.

Read full topic
item.source: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development

item.title: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Wildy kingz:

im gunna teach him how to make global objects, teleport/sM commands, and starting message

That’s not teaching him anything. That’s telling him what methods to call in order achieve a certain result. It’s like going to school on a Monday, having the teacher say “1 + 1 = 2. Tell me this Friday and you pass.” You’re not helping them at all by telling them this. In fact you’re further hindering their advancement.

Instead, he should learn how to use Java as more than the language used to “code RSPS”. As many others will say, learning a programming language by way of a Private Server (especially Delta based) teaches bad programming practices. And for most people, it’s hard to unlearn.

Read full topic
item.source: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development

item.title: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Instead of creating a thread about how to “code RSPS”, you should instead by learning from the various resources how to program using Java. Knowing that information will serve you much better in the future than knowing how to “code RSPS”. The reason you will learn very little with this thread, is because the things that you want to know how to do vary greatly between sources. If you know how to program in Java, then the questions you have answer themselves.

Read full topic
item.source: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development

item.title: Want To Be A Aprentice In RSPS Development
item.dc:creator: @Clawz_fury lare69
item.description:
@Clawz_fury wrote:

I’m sorry but no one is honestly going to teach you how to program an rsps from scratch…
Read up on some Java and learn the protocol.

Read full topic
